title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Elevate your space with effortless luxury. The GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers instantly add a rich, modern glow to any room with their plush 100% velvet fabric and chic gold hue. Soft, smooth, and irresistibly touchable, these 18 x 18 inch cushion covers come in a convenient 2-pack—perfect for styling your couch, bed, chairs, or window seat. They’re equally at home in living rooms, bedrooms, offices, coffee shops, and even your car.

Why you’ll love them:
- Luxe velvet feel: Silky-soft texture brings comfort and sophistication to your decor.
- Perfect fit: Designed for 18 x 18 inch inserts and also looks fuller with 20 x 20 inch inserts.
- Seamless look: Invisible zipper (longer than 35 cm) makes inserting cushions easy while keeping the design clean and elegant.
- Easy care: Machine washable in cold water; tumble dry on low to keep them looking fresh.

Refresh your home in minutes with a warm, golden accent that pairs beautifully with modern, boho, glam, or classic styles. Questions or suggestions? Our customer support is ready to help ensure you love your new pillows. Bring home the glow with GIGIZAZA.
